scripts.upload-assets: wrangler kv key put index.html --binding ASSETS --path dist/index.html && wrangler kv key put assets/index.css --binding ASSETS --path dist/assets/index.css && wrangler kv key put assets/index.js --binding ASSETS --path dist/assets/index.js
scripts.upload-assets-remote: wrangler kv key put index.html --remote --binding ASSETS --path dist/index.html && wrangler kv key put assets/index.css --remote --binding ASSETS --path dist/assets/index.css && wrangler kv key put assets/index.js --remote --binding ASSETS --path dist/assets/index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload-assets-remote && wrangler deploy
scripts.wrangler-dev: npm run build && npm run upload-assets && wrangler dev
